title: Edge Rushing Prospects With Charles McDonald (Ep. 89)
description:
The Ringer's Robert Mays is joined by 'Bleacher Report' NFL 1000 analyst Charles McDonald to discuss Myles Garrett as a franchise foundation piece (02:00),  Jonathan Allen vs. Solomon Thomas (6:45), possible second-round standouts (21:30), and T.J. Watt (37:30).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
